title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1225.23 - Freight subject to I.C.C. regulations not handled unless in compliance with such regulations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1225.23 - Freight subject to I.C.C. regulations not handled unless in compliance with such regulations

State Regulations

Freight subject to the I.C.C. regulations will not be
handled at a truck terminal unless it in every respect complies with said
regulations, including, without limiting the generality of the foregoing, regulations regarding forbidden articles, proper condition for transportation, containers, packing, marking, labeling, description, certification, quantity
limitation and loading. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1225.23

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
